prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of James J. Kilpatrick, 1952-1963, Accession #6626-i, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Library acquired these papers from James J. Kilpatrick in November 1979.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The collection contains invitations to various public events and related correspondence.
